text: there's a lot of reasons I started farming primarily didn't want to be stuck in an office but farming is also a way to address a lot of different things that I find it Borden like environmental sustainability social equality all those things and still do it in a way that's really constructive and productive my name is Russell Han dirt from king of crops and i'm a proud supplier of peach dish
